entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:33 p.m. MST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rock River 1:00 AM MST Saturday 1 April 2023
Temperature: -16.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -19.5°C

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Blizzard and periods of snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except east 60 gusting to 80 near the Richardson mountains. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:33 PM MST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind light except east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near the Richardson mountains in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:33 PM MST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:33 PM MST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 9. Forecast issued 11:33 PM MST Friday 31 March 2023
